verbs.description: [ARG1: plane] [V: crashes] [ARGM-DIR: into hudson] a plane flying from new york city to charlotte ditched into the icy waters off manhattan after apparently hitting flock of geese all passengers and crew survived thanks to pilot masterful job lexington kentucky federal aviation administration janis krums windows hudson joint base elmendorf richardson laguardia airport continental airlines erica schietinger united states air force jonathan dienst
